runs.comm: first ball pitches on a length and is on the stumps, on target straight away. Defended by the batsman.
slightly straighter this time, Finch pushes it to the on side, but there's no run
hint of swing, but that one is wide and full and Finch launches that one over mid on and there's no stopping that one
length on the stumps again, Finch pushes it to the now-vacant mid on and takes an easy single
fullish ball well wide of Maddinson, who tries to cut but misses

first international runs for Maddinson, and that is a decent stroke. Full, pitching just on off stump. Maddinson gets a stride in and drives it straight back past the non-striker's stumps to collect the second four of the over
length ball angled across, a little bit of shape there, and Maddinson pokes and misses

but now Maddinson gets his second boundary. The full balls have disappeared so far and this is no different. Overpitched outside off stump, Maddinson gets the lofted off drive out and sends it to the long off fence
fine start this. Opened the face on yet another fullish delivery. This one was wider, so it was carved behind square on the off side, aerially
length ball closer into the stumps, Maddinson pushes that into the infield and scampers through
length ball on off stump, defended into the off side
no fear there. Maddinson charges Ashwin's first ball and lofts it over extra cover for a boundary
length ball on the stumps, straightening, pushed into the infield and a comfortable single ensues
neither spin or seam working here. Finch backs away, gets far enough from the length ball and cuts it in the gap behind square for four
another back-away, but this time the ball is fuller and he hits this one through cover
makes room again, but Ashwin goes closer to the batsman and he hits it straight to cover
mayhem early on here. Finch hasn't backed away this time, and Ashwin bowls it full and wide. Batsman gets low and carves it over cover-point and it almost gets to the fence on the full
how good does this kid look? That wasn't even that short there, and he has sat back and pulled  Ishant Sharma way into the stands. What a blow.
India are rattled! This one is shorter, swivel pulls that neatly and powerfully past square leg for another four
length on the stumps, defended into the off side
bowls wide of the crease, length ball angled into the stumps, defended square on the off side and there's no run
shorter and slightly outside off stump, turned away nicely to third man, who runs around to collect
length ball on the stumps, Finch moves across and clips it into a gap on the legside
full and way down the leg side
legside again, full and on the pads, but Finch finds the fine-leg fielder with his flick
length ball outside off stump, Maddinson comes down the pitch and slogs across the line, but he gets an under edge and it goes to deep midwicket
fullish on off stump, driven to long on.
and as soon as I say that, Nic Maddinson backs away and carves a full, wide delivery over backward point for another boundary

gone! Bit of inexperience there you have to think. He was batting so well, playing decent shots, but he goes for an ungainly swipe across the line, and Kumar comes in from around the wicket to angle one in. Maddinson misses, Bhuvneshwar hits the top of off stump and sends the wicket flying. Promising first innings though.

misfield gives up a four. It was a wide length ball from Bhuvneshwar and Watson played it late. Ishant Sharma at short third man should have stopped it, but he only gets a hand to it and carries on to the boundary
short, wide and struck powerfully past a diving backward point to the boundary.

another boundary off a misfield, almost identical, but Ashwin is the culprit this time. Short, but not as wide as the last delivery, Finch plays it late and Ashwin can't collect at short third man. Slips through for four
closer into the body, Finch chops down on it, no run
full and on the stumps, driven along the ground to long on
length ball on off stump, defended into the legside and there's time for a run
slower ball, full toss outside off stump, driven nicely past a diving mid off for four
full and flighted, turning away from off stump, Watson has a swing but it turns away from the blade and he misses
full but closer into the stumps, drives it to deep cover this time
short ball close into the stumps, Finch misses with a cut
shortish and wide, and Finch absolutely lays into this, backing away to loft it over deep cover for six
short, fast and wide, Finch makes room again and misses, temporarily losing his balance
full toss on the legs, driven along the ground to wide long on
shortish and wide, cut away to the fielder but there's enough time for one
full and that will be a wide down the leg side
jagged back in sharply, off a length and it misses Watson's big off drive. Hits him on the back pad and he has to go. Very good ball
that was fullish and down the legside as well, but it must have collected pad on the way through, no wide
length ball on the stumps, defended to the off side

short ball on the stumps and Bailey doesn't last long. He pulls that one, but not very well. The mistimed stroke goes straight to the man at deep square leg. Second wicket of the over, and it could be a match-changing one for India
fullish on the stumps, this is turned away into the leg side, and the batsmen take two
fullish on the stumps, straightening, turned into the leg side for a single
backs away slightly and tries to hit that one through the off side, but can't beat the field
backs away again, but Jadeja follows him and yorks him, preventing a big shot
full and flat outside off stump, driven aerially to long on
wide and slightly short, Maxwell chops it in front of square to the sweeper on the off side
shorter this time, still wide. Cut away to the square sweeper again, on the off side
and he's immediately punished. Goes well wide of leg stump from around the wicket, Finch helps it on its way past fine leg
way wide down the leg side, not even Dhoni can collect
over the wicket now, and the result is even worse. Fullish on off stump, Maxwell gets a hold of that and deposits it in the stand behind wide long on
straighter but the result is the same, slog swept powerfully over cow corner. This one's even bigger
a breather for Ashwin, flatter faster, pitching on a length, Maxwell can't get that beyond the bowler
worst ball of the over, and that's saying something. Thigh-high full toss on off stump, Maxwell eats this up. Launched over cow corner again
length ball on the stumps, batsman bludgeons that to long on. Oh and an overthrow gives an extra run.
fullish and on the stumps, driven hard wide of long on
length on the stumps, pushed into the off side
it keeps raining sixes, and it's in that cow corner area again. Shortish on the stumps, and Maxwell slams that just over the deep midwicket boundary for another biggie
driven down the ground to long off
on the stumps, driven into the infield
a big shot on the off side from Maxwell, but Jadeja turns it away from the bat and he misses
makes room and tries to force it through the off side, but Jadeja yorks him and he can't do much with it

he's gone now. Maxwell was aiming for yet another six, but Jadeja does him in the flight, and he mistimes this to Ishant Sharma at long on, who takes it just inside the rope, I think. Umpires check it and replays show that Sharma didn't touch the boundary. Good catch, and a decent ball from Jadeja. Took the bottom edge I think,
on the stumps and defended back to the bowler
pitched wider from Jadeja, Finch frees his arms and hits it to long off
length ball outside off stump, sliding on. Haddin gets off the mark by opening the face and gliding it past slip
what a shot. Finch makes room , and that's another boundary. Full and on the stumps, carved powerfully over cover for four
closer into the stumps, that length ball is pulled away aerially towards deep mid wicket, where it drops well safe
full and on the stumps, turned away into the legside outfield
Finch is playing some innings here, but that's poor bowling as well. Kohli strays a length ball onto the pads, Finch swivels, gets it past short fine leg and to the fence
backs away and drives a full ball down the ground
short wide ball down the leg side, Dhoni can't collect
length ball straightening on off stump, turned into the legside again and it's collected at wide long on
shortish, outside off stump, cut away to the square sweeper on the off side
short of a length on off stump, cut away again, but this time third man comes around to collect

short, wide and out. That deserved to go the boundary, but instead it ends in the wicketkeeper's gloves. Might have moved slightly off the seam, but it wasn't much. Haddin cuts at it, and gets a top edge to the keeper
short again, but closer to the stumps, Henriques cuts but gets a bottom edge onto the pitch
short of a length and that's some placement! Finch muscles that ball onto the leg side, and long on and midwicket almost bump into each other on the fence as it dissects them perfectly
fullish ball pushed into the offside infield
full ball straightening on the stumps, Henriques defends
shorter and straightening on middle this time, turned away for a well run two
wider and shorter, cut to the cover sweeper who runs around to cut it off
low full toss on the stumps, Finch drives it to long on
full on the stumps, straightening. Henriques comes forward and hits it toward long on, where there is a gap
full on the stumps, hit through the off side for a single
full on the stumps and Finch has played that inside-out shot so well today. Gets low, and carves it over cover again, right in between the two fielders
and a poor ball follows. Full toss on the pads, Finch launches that straight-ish on the leg side. Splits long on and midwicket again
full on the pads, driven to long on
slower ball, short and wide. Henriques waits for it and deflects it behind square on the off side for a single
short of a length, and a little wide. Finch is just preying on anything even slightly off line. Cuts that powerfully, cover sweeper runs around and dives, but can only help it onto the boundary
length outside off stump, driven to that deep cover man again, who does enough to prevent two
slower ball, fullish on off stump, Finch has a big swing, but mistimes it. Goes along the ground to wide mid on
length ball outside off stump, driven to long off

he's got him. Can you believe it's off a knee-high full toss? That's floated up to Finch, who misjudges the pace, and is too early on the shot. He gets an under-edge and hits it straight back to the bowler, who seems to hurt his finger as he holds on. End of a very good innings.
slower ball on the stumps, turned square on the leg side for a single
full and wide, driven to deep cover who fields it smartly and keeps it to one run
slower ball, legcutter I think, straightening on middle stump. Batsman backs away slightly and chops it straight to point.
short ball outside off stump, batsman has a big swing but misses
length ball outside off stump, and that's played beautifully late. Just opens the face and third man dives, but it's too fine for him
fuller and closer to the stumps, tries to open the face again but misses
and another slower ball does the trick. Shortish one, outside off stump. Henriques tries to pull but again, is too early and a leading edge balloons to point
fullish ball, hit along the ground to cover and the batsmen scamper through
slower leg cutter again, straightening just outside off stump, Faulkner opens the face and gets one behind square
length ball on off stump, pushed square into the offside infield, where there is a gap
full on off stump, driven to long off
slower ball short and outside off stump, cut away to third man without much power
full wide, and Coulter-Nile goes down on one knee to square drive that past backward point and to the fence. Good shot
wide-ish yorker again, Coulter-Nile chops down on it but misses
length ball, slower one on the pads, N C-N tries to swivel pull that away, but has the timing completely wrong. Ball strikes him on the thigh-pad and they run through for a leg bye
short ball just outside off stump, batsman aims a big baseball shot but misses
full and a little wide, Coulter-Nile tries to carve that high over the off side, but mistimes it. Clears the infield though and a fielder runs back to collect
full and wide again, driven along the ground to the offside sweeper this time
short of a length outiside off stump, Faulkner stands tall and swats that cross-batted on the off side, but a diving extra-cover allows only one
full and slightly wide, driven straight to Raina at extra-cover again

and they get to 200 with a big one off the last ball. Poor ball from Ishant. It was full on the stumps and right in the slot. Faulkner just swings big and connects well enough to clear the boundary at wide mid-on.
